channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta faces publisher copyright AI lawsuit in France
item.description: Meta is facing an AI copyright lawsuit in France that’s been brought by authors and publishers who are accusing it of economic “parasitism,” Reuters r...

item.title: Chinese Companies Rush to Put DeepSeek in Everything
item.description: From video game developers to a nuclear power plant, companies across China are adopting DeepSeek’s AI models to boost stock prices and flaunt their n...

item.title: How to Watch March Madness 2025
item.description: Here’s how you can tune in to watch the men’s and women’s teams fight to win the 2025 NCAA Division I Basketball championship.

item.title: 7 Best Kids Bikes (2025): Mountain, Balance, Pedal, Coaster
item.description: The WIRED Gear team has tested all types of kids’ bikes. Here are our top picks.

item.title: 8 Best Vacuums for Pet Hair (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

item.title: How La Fourche, an online organic supermarket, is thriving after q-commerce’s busted flush
item.description: La Fourche is just seven years old but it has been quite a rollercoaster for the French startup. During this time, the online grocery retailer has gon...

item.title: Ditto lands $82M to synchronize data from the edge to the cloud
item.description: Ditto, a company that’s setting out to bring “resilient” connectivity to edge devices, has raised $82 million in a Series B round of funding at a post...

item.title: Wolf Games, backed by ‘Law & Order’ creator, uses AI to create murder mystery games
item.description: Elliot Wolf, the executive producer and son of “Law & Order” creator Dick Wolf, is entering a new venture aimed at engaging true crime fans. He, along...

item.title: Pentera nabs $60M at a $1B+ valuation to build simulated network attacks to train security teams
item.description: Strong and smart security operations teams are at the heart of any cybersecurity strategy, and today a startup that builds tooling to help keep them o...

item.title: How to Switch iPhones or iPads and Transfer Data (2025)
item.description: Everything you need to know to successfully transfer your contacts, music, photos, and apps from one iOS device to another.
